meanings.definition: A strip of film containing a series of related images for projection.
meanings.sent1: The teacher showed us a filmstrip of animals in the wild.
meanings.sent2: The filmstrip was loaded into the projector for the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The filmstrip of the dancing penguins made the class giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her memories played out like a filmstrip in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The filmstrip of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like we were there.

meanings.sent1: I will filmstrip the family reunion to cherish the memories.
meanings.sent2: She filmstripped the entire event to share with friends.
meanings.sent3: He filmstripped the cooking disaster, turning it into a comedy.
meanings.sent4: The artist filmstripped the beauty of nature onto the reel.
meanings.sent5: Filmstripping the journey made it feel like a timeless adventure.
